summary: PROBLEMS WITH BUNK BED IN 2003 JAYCO KIWI 23D HYBRID/RV CAMPER.  *MR  DURING HIGH SPEEDS OF 30 MPH PLUS, THE BED RAISES JUST ENOUGH THAT THE POLES COME OUT OF THE NOTCH UNDER THE BED.  ALSO THE BUNK BED THAT IS 6 FEET OFF THE FLOOR HAS NO RAIL.  THE CONSUMER COMPLAINED TO THE MANUFACTURER BUT THEY DIDN'T RESPOND.  (JAYCO KIWI 23D HYBRID 2003 CAMPER)  *SCC  *JB
